sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'

import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'

import './css/Vhe.scss'

const Vhe = (props) => {
    const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
    return (
        <>
            <Card className='vhe_CARD' style={{ width: '18rem' }}>
                <Card.Img variant="top" src={props.vhe.vheImageUrl}/>
                <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Title>{props.vhe.vheId}</Card.Title>
                    <Card.Text style={{display: isOpen ? 'block' : 'none'}}>{props.vhe.vheDescription}</Card.Text>
                    <Card.Text>{props.vhe.vheColor}</Card.Text>
                    <Button
                        variant="primary"
                        onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
                    >
                        VHE details
                        {/* <Link
                            to='/vhe_details'
                            vhe={props.vhe}
                        >VHE details</Link> */}
                    </Button>
                </Card.Body>
            </Card>
        </>
    )
}

export default Vhe
